name: Eudaimonia
description: Eudaimonia explores the concept of happiness through the artist’s own style which consist of vibrant colors and abstract lines. In this piece, we get to have a special glimpse of Marso’s own interpretation of what happiness is through a trippy journey with her main subject: the clown.  Reminiscent of the 80’s era,  the clown can be seen as a goofy character but Marso takes it up a notch by mixing her own candy popping style to give an iconic character a fresh new take.
